## Learning Outcomes

::: {.callout-important title="Principal Learning Outcome 5"}
Describe energy homeostasis in daily life and how it changes due to stress, exercise, and disease.
:::

After this lecture, you should be able to:

- Describe key components of the neurobiology of food intake
- Describe metabolic syndrome and how it relates to cardiometabolic disease
- Understand insulin resistance
- Understand different types of diabetes
- Describe different treatments (incl. bariatric surgery, medication)
